code: import{FailToast}from"components/React/ToastNotifier/ToastNotifier";import{getTextByLanguage}from"i18n/i18n";var _ref=[btoa(btoa("access_token")),btoa(btoa("refresh_token"))],at=_ref[0],rt=_ref[1];var encodeToken=function encodeToken(token){try{var tokenWithBrowserData=JSON.stringify(token);return tokenWithBrowserData;}catch(e){console.log("Error encoding token",e);return token;}};var decodeToken=function decodeToken(token){if(!token)return"";try{var tkams=JSON.parse(token);return tkams;}catch(e){console.log("Error decoding token",e);clearToken();FailToast(getTextByLanguage("Your session has expired.","तपाईको सत्रको समयावधि सकियो।"));return token;}};function setToken(tokenObj){try{localStorage.setItem(at,encodeToken(tokenObj));}catch(e){console.log("Local Store error",e);}}function getAccessToken(){var accessToken="";try{accessToken=decodeToken(localStorage.getItem(at)||"");}catch(e){console.log("Local Store error",e);}return accessToken;}function getRefreshToken(){var refreshToken="";try{refreshToken=localStorage.getItem(rt)||"";}catch(e){console.log("Local Store error",e);}return refreshToken;}function clearToken(){localStorage.removeItem(at);localStorage.removeItem(rt);}var TokenService={setToken:setToken,getAccessToken:getAccessToken,getRefreshToken:getRefreshToken,clearToken:clearToken};export default TokenService;
